cause.description:
Guided by a shared experience of reverence for our entire planetary ecosystem, The Heart of the Healer (THOTH) is a global community of visionary women, men and children dedicated to the emergence of a sustainable sacred partnership between humankind and our Mother Earth.
Honoring indigenous wisdom traditions, we foster the spiritual reawakening of humanity through the reenactment of earth-honoring ceremonies and healing practices at ancestral sacred sites worldwide. Acknowledging the power of consciousness and creative imagination to transform the larger social order in which we live, we embrace a path of life-affirming service that reflects unity, peace and compassionate cooperation among all people.
Our mission is to:
-Preserve and revitalize indigenous earth-honoring wisdom and ceremonial healing practices
-Protect ancestral sacred sites, pilgrimage destinations, natural landscape shrines and tribal lands
-Impart the prophetic vision and mythic reality of native peoples as expressed through their creation stories, tribal legends, ceremonial rites-of-passage, art, music, dance, song and other traditional forms of cultural identity
-Disseminate the Pachakuti Mesa tradition of cross-cultural shamanism through practitioner apprenticeships and teacher certification programs involving the nurturance of heartfelt sacred community worldwide
1. Indigenous earth-honoring wisdom and ceremonial healing practices must be preserved.
2. Ancestral sacred sites, pilgrimage destinations, natural landscape shrines and tribal lands must be protected.
cause.mission: Preserving indigenous wisdom, restoring our Earth.
cause.name: The Heart of the Healer (THOTH)
